concept.title: Troubleshooting
concept.shortdesc: This section contains instructions to help troubleshoot tag container deployment.

section.title: Confirm that the container is deployed
section.p: The Status column on the Container Environment Overview displays which revision is deployed in each environment.
Confirm that a tag revision is deployed in the environment you are testing.

section.title: Verify the environment cookie
section.p: If you are testing a development or stage version, verify that the s_tagEnv cookie is set with a value of dev, stage, or live:
If not, use the environment bookmarklets to set the environment cookie, or define the cookie using a debugger:

section.title: Verify the page code and amc.js
section.p: Use a debugger to verify that the tag management 2.0 page code is on the page directly after the opening <body> element.
If the page code is present but the tag container is not loading on some of your pages, verify that the bucket_id in your page code matches the bucket_id in amc.js:
To get the bucket_id of a tag container, click Get Page code and find the bucket_id. Confirm that the bucket ID of this page code matches the page code you deployed.
